amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 115-20 to exempt any rule or set of rules relating to Title I of the Elementary a nd Secondary Education Act of 1965.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
